name: School Bag Designer - Creative Coloring Kid Games
name_original: School Bag Designer - Creative Coloring Kid Games
description:
Do you love your school bag? Do you want to make a bag of your own? Of course every kids love to be a creative bag maker, well then come to make your own bag now! You have ton of decorating item with which you can decorate your bag. Enjoy!

Choose your favorite color for your bag;
Add your favorite little kit to your bag;
When it is done, share with your friends.
